description:
Time for a new chain? This reliable option from KMC will get your 11-speed steed back on the trails, roads or bike lanes in no time.

  • Compatible with SRAM, Shimano and Campagnolo 11-speed drivetrains
  • Includes a reusable KMC Missing Link 11 for easy installation and removal
  • Nickel plating prevents corrosion and adds durability
  • Inner and outer chamfering for smoother shifting in 1x drivetrains
  • Width: 5.5mm
  • Non-directional
name: KMC X11 11 Speed Chain
